stories.text: Can anyone recommend a good api for generating pdf documents? I'm thinking of something that you can provide with a template (maybe html) and a model and it spits out a pdf document. I know it's not too difficult to write one's own, I'm just curious.
stories.title: Ask HN: Looking for recommendations for document generation APIs
